title: Ebro In The Morning - 2021 GRAMMY Nominees + Thanksgiving Eve
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 11/24.

Ebro and the crew talk about the recently announced GRAMMY nominees (46), how the New York Knicks played themselves (29), no one believes Ebro's story (44) and it's time to debate Thanksgiving (53). 

Click here to learn about the Hot 97 - Securing the Future initiative. 

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
